name: Breakout x 3
description:
In Breakout, my new game, you have to destroy all the elements that block your way home.
Use the power-ups to increase your destruction power and collect all the points to get the best score!

Music: Megalovania - Undertale (8 Bit Universe Version) from  8 Bit Universe

Hit Effect: Golpe fuerte sobre superficie - efecto de sonido from Sonidoefectos FX

Assets Base: Survival Shooter from Unity
